summary: Provides a Conan toolchain class that generates and manages Autotools build configurations, converting package settings into appropriate compiler, linker and environment flags while handling platform‑specific details such as MSVC, Apple, and Android cross‑compilation.
business_intent: Facilitates reliable and portable building of C/C++ packages with Autotools through Conan by automating flag generation and environment setup across diverse operating systems and toolchains.
